Flat screen TV, WiFi & fully stocked kitchen & bath. Watch a movie on premium cable (HBO, etc.), cook a yummy dinner from the Farmers' Market, or just relax. Laundromat right across the street. Perfect spot to have as a home base while you work, visit family or explore NYC!

Jersey City permit #STR20-00021

The space
Have the entire garden level, 2 bedroom apartment of this historic 1840s home all to your self! With your own private, keyless entry, this will truly feel like home. Completely renovated with everything you could possibly need - including central A/C & heating - and even closer to Manhattan than many parts of NYC! This unit is only used for airbnb rentals, so it is outfitted to cater to your exact needs. The unit is professionally sanitized between guests.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the historic heart of Jersey City - a vibrant, diverse neighborhood with excellent restaurants and a burgeoning art scene just minutes from downtown Manhattan.  Be sure to check out Kitchen Step, South House, Skinner's Loft, Downtown Yogurt, Van Hook Cheese and Pasta dal Cuore.  Take a stroll down our beautiful streets lined with historic brownstones, and have a cup of coffee in one of the many parks.  Don't miss a short walk to the waterfront for amazing views of Manhattan!

name: Grand Garden Apt - Close to NYC
description:
This charming garden apartment is located in a two family nineteen century brownstone across from a park.

The space
Enter this quaint apartment through a ground floor entrance leading into long hallway. To the left behind a french door you have a specious leaving room decorated with original artworks. There you can watch tv or or use modern large desk as a workstation. The hallway leads to a old charm large kitchen. For your convenience you'll find there a dishwasher, washing machine and a dryer. Behind the kitchen there is the bedroom offering a king size bed for your comfortable rest. On nice days enjoy the backyard accessible from the bedroom through a large glass door.

Guest access
The entire ground level of the apartment is exclusively for your enjoyment. There is a staircase leading to the floor above but the door on the top of the staicase is locked. The owner occasionally stays there.

description:
Our studio is an exceedingly clean, tidy and neat place where our guest can rest and relax after a busy day enjoying all the attractions that New York City has to offer.
The location is great - only one block from the PATH train and two stations away from New York’s World Trade Center (10-15 mins) – it is easier and faster to get to downtown Manhattan from this location than from many Uptown locations within Manhattan. It takes about 25 minutes to get to the Midtown NYC.

The space

Parking in private driveway. The apartment features a queen sized bed, a foldout futon (for parties of 4), a full kitchen featuring brand new appliances, laundry, high speed WiFi, and a 42” LED TV with Netflix. Bus to NYC around the corner, and PATH train to Manhattan is a 15 minute walk away.

The space
Around the corner, a bus running every 10 minutes takes you to Midtown Manhattan in 20 minutes - stopping within walking distance of beautiful Times Square. If downtown Manhattan is your destination, the Journal Square PATH train station is located 15 minutes from the apartment and provides direct train service to World Trade Center.

The upscale, pet-friendly building’s amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, fitness center with yoga studio, children's playroom, pool with sundeck, billiards room, lounge and more. The PATH train, located mere steps from the apartment building, provides a 10-20 minute ride into Manhattan.

The space
This vibrant two bedroom is located in a luxury building in the lively Grove Street neighborhood of Jersey City. The apartment features great Jersey City views, high ceilings, stainless steel kitchen appliances, white matte finish kitchen cabinets, cashmere white countertops, gray subway tile backsplash, LED lighting th
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. It is also one of the most ethnically diverse cities in the world, with large populations of Hispanic, Asian and Indian Americans. The Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) train, a 24-hour s

name: Lux 2 Bedroom w/wifi at Newport Jersey City
description:
Overlooking the breathtaking Manhattan skyline & harbor this luxury 40 story high-rise offers great amenities including a community center equipped with billiards, a gaming area and flat screen televisions, as well as a newly renovated fitness center.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Resident lounge
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large newly remodeled fitness center with new equipment
• Sun Deck
• Community room with billiards, gaming area, flat screen TVs, fireplace & computers
• Children's play area with flat screen TV
• On-site restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Beautiful, clean, pvt bedroom 30 min to TIMES SQ!
description:
This lovely, quiet and well designed space is a 1 min walk from frequently running buses that will have you in times square in about 35 min. There is a liquor/convenience store around the corner. There is a park featuring tennis courts, year round indoor pool, seasonal ice skating rink and Manhattan skyline views, two blocks away. There are a variety of small restaurants in walking distance. The neighborhood is very quiet comfortable and safe at all hours.

The space
The room features 42 inch tv, leather clubman chair w/ottoman, full size bed, standing closet with iron and blowdryer. Attractive details through out. The livingroom is Paresian influenced minimalist decor. There is a country style eat in kitchen with a corner knook. All very clean, comfy and cozy.

Guest access
Eat in kitchen, living room, private bedroom, shared bathroom.

Other things to note
We provide towels, wash clothes, body wash, shampoo and tooth p

name: CLEAN & SAFE!  Sunny, spacious apt - steps to NYC!
description:
CLEAN AND SAFE! We take cleaning seriously so you can feel comfortable throughout your stay. Your health and safety are our top priorities. We follow cleaning and sanitization protocols from the CDC, Airbnb and the NJ Department of Health to ensure a safe, healthy and comfortable stay for our guests.

The space
Cleaning, Disinfection and Sterilization Procedures  
•  Housekeepers perform a deep cleaning and sanitization between each stay to clean and sanitize your apartment thoroughly.
•  Bedroom linens, towels, kitchen towels and bath mats are washed and fully sanitized, all mattresses and pillows are covered with mattress and pillow covers for an extra layer of protection.
•  Amenities such as shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottles are sanitized and disinfected. Frequently touched surfaces (light switches, doorknobs, faucets, remote controls, etc.) are thoroughly disinfected and given an extra level of priority.

Minutes to Manha

It's the perfect place to relax after a day of sightseeing and shopping.

* FREE garage parking in our property for ONE car.

Jersey City is one of the most multicultural diversity city in USA. All types of unique food and services can be find here.

For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.

neighborhood_overview:
Historic Downtown Jersey City is brimming with activity! With its close proximity to NYC, the area has seen a rapid development in the past 7 years and is now home to a diverse mix of locals, restaurants, bars and businesses. Just take a look on Yelp and you will find over 50 places to eat and drink at that are rated 4 STARS and above, all within a 10 minute walk from the apartment! In addition, there is Newport Mall nearby, which has a lot of shopping options (H&M, Zara, Coach, G-Star, Macys, Footlocker to name a few) a cinema and a diverse food court.

In our opinion, there are only 3 areas in New Jersey that are worth staying in if you are visiting NYC for a vacation or for business. Downtown Jersey City, Historic Jersey City and Hoboken due to their transport links to Manhattan, great local bars and restaurants, and for being known as incredibly safe areas.

description:
This is an excellent one-bedroom apartment located in Hamilton Park which is the most desirable neighborhood in Jersey City! It is calm and clean, and Grove Street Station (PATH) is only a few blocks away (7 min walk). If you like shopping, Newport Centre is just a few minutes walk. There are lots of great restaurants/bars/cafes nearby, and the building has laundry machines in the basement.

The space
It is a 3rd-floor apartment (walk up) with everything you need! The bedroom has a queen sized bed, closet and drawers, and the windows are facing south. Lots of natural light comes in through the windows.

The living room has a sleeper sofa, a TV (cable) and a dining table that can host six people. The kitchen is fully equipped with cooking tools and appliances. The kitchen windows overlook the nice backyards of the building.

It has a central heating and cooling system that is quiet.

Private Entry. The unit is below grade yet has good lighting. The building is a 200 year old brick brownstone style dwelling. The air conditioner is a window unit. Lovely and Comfortable room in a single family home. Nice and clean bathroom. Located in Jersey City Heights, close to all NYC transportation and shopping areas. 20 minutes by bus or train to Manhattan, Times Square or World Trade Center. Walk two blocks to Light Rail station or one block to all Buses to New York City, Hoboken and the PATH trains. Safe, Nice and quiet neighborhood. Coffee, Milk, Bagels Orange Juice and water are included with no extra charge. Free WI-FI access.

The space
Room include a new comfortable full side bed, refrigerator, coffee machine, toaster and microwave.

name: Cozy apt in Jersey city near Public Transportation
description:
For those who are looking for a homely feel, and want to see what it's like living in the tri state are, this may be a good fit for you. Fully furnished apartment near public transportation and highways. You can check out many areas of Hudson county, and be near NYC without paying NYC prices. Lots of shopping areas in Jersey City, and we have some 24 hour spots near us. The apt is also near a large park and a golf course. The key to Jersey City is convenience. check out https://youtu.be/14nd

The space
One bedroom furnished basement apartment available. There is a private entrance at the back of the house. It has a washer/dryer, kitchen, microwave, fridge, and internet included. We also have a coffee-maker, coffee, tea, and water available as part of your stay.

The ceilings are 7 ft high, and the apt has a full standup shower. For the average person up to 6'4 ft., you should be comfortable. The essentials are included in the apt, which should m

name: The Victorian; Luxury 3bed, Easy to NY free park
description:
A serene modern Victorian getaway. This gorgeous house was built in 1909 a truly historic gem that was restored to its original glory. A spacious retreat outfitted for even the most discerning group of travelers. Whether you are visiting friends, traveling for work, or ready to live like a local. The Victorian is where you will want to relax after a day of enjoying the city.

The space
Designed with guests in mind. Comfort was a main goal , this was expressed in the queen memory foam mattress in each room as well as the gel infused pillows for a restful night after all the touring of the city sights. Simple amenities provided so you dont have to travel with extra weight .. fresh towels and linens as well as shampoo, body wash, soap and hair dryers.

Guest access
Guests have access to the backyard area. Laundry washer and dryer area. They also have access to one parking spot in the driveway (must be reserved)

Other things to not
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great ! its the melting pot just like NYC with many cultures all around . Down the street you have access to everything from Pizza to Vietnamese and Filipino restaurants. It is a pretty quite street after a long day in the busy city.

host_about: Workplace design strategist who loves to travel and meet people from different cultures ! Love Architecture and design ! And good food !!

name: Chic Large Family home! Quick train or bus to NYC!
description:
Our hip urban home is a great base for your family gatherings or City adventures! Gorgeous chef's kitchen, two 55" TVs with speedy WiFi (Netflix, Hulu, etc). Ideal for groups of 6 to 10 (but sleeps up to 17!). Vibrant family-friendly neighborhood, a short 20 min. walk to Journal Square PATH station which has buses & trains to NYC, Hoboken and Newark Airport, all within a 10-25 min subway ride. Our family lives in the downstairs attached home. Ask about on-site childcare & renting parking spaces.

The space
We are a local family, not absentee landlords. We live in the attached home below, but your home will have its own private, locked entry and entirely private spaces.

Built over a century ago, our fully-renovated 3 bedroom/2 bath home includes a well-lit Victorian double salon with high ceilings and a spacious attic bonus room (a great hideaway for kids and teenagers— or couples who want a big bed for each to sleep on) where there are two queen beds,
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is a gem with the best view of the Manhattan skyline and a 7 min drive to the Statue of Liberty! Hoboken, home of Carlo's Bakery, is our next door neighbor. Our neighborhood is especially family friendly and walkable. Enjoy tennis, picnicking, bike trails and multiple playgrounds, all within a 3-minute walk from your home away from home. Just around the corner is a Catholic church, an array of ethnic eateries, a Dairy Queen, convenience stores, fruitstands, hair salons, etc.

We are also close to Liberty State Park, where you can catch a ferry to the Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, or to NYC!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
We are the parents of three young adults, and former foster parents; Mike is a professor and Kennan teaches at a cancer hospital in NYC. We consider ourselves to be committed to our community. 
We speak Spanish (though we are rusty).  Kennan can sign (though she is rusty too). But we would love to get some practice. 
We find great joy in hosting people and families from all over the world!

name: Stylish Apt 40 mins from NYC - TV, Parking, W/D
description:
Monthly renters welcome.

Rent this tastefully decorated, sun drenched one bedroom urban apartment 40 minutes away from Manhattan. Located 2 blocks from the light rail train in the bustling Bergen-Lafayette section of Jersey City, this unit features a driveway for parking, plush queen bed, an extra air mattress, 49" LED TV, Netflix and WiFi, fully equipped kitchen, walk-in shower, and in-unit laundry. You will be steps away from parks and trendy restaurants.

The space
This apartment has been updated to feature a mix of modern design and old-world brick townhouse charm. Everything you need is provided - fresh towels, tissue paper, soaps/shampoo/bodywash, cooking utensils and new appliances. Ground coffee and coffee maker in the kitchen will power your mornings and prepare you for a full day of NYC sightseeing.

Guest access
You may park your vehicle in the gated driveway in front of the house and enjoy a small backyard area in
neighborhood_overview:
Bergen-Lafayette is an urban neighborhood offering a diverse mix of residents, sights, and activities. This is a decent neighborhood and is generally safe. Please remember you are in Jersey City, not all of its streets are lined with charming brownstones and upscale restaurants. Some blocks, like ours, will give you extra entertainment in the form of the occasional loud boombox or kids playing lively games of hide and seek on the street.

Uber is very popular in Jersey City, and a ride between the apartment and the PATH station at Exchange Place in Downtown won't cost more than $10. They will take a group of 4 people, which means your cost per-person will be lower than the $2.5 light rail ticket. If you haven't used Uber before, let me know and I will send you an invite which comes with a small discount.

name: Spacious Apt - Home Away From Home. Mins from NYC!
description:
Find your "home away from home" in this spacious, 2 bedroom apt in a trending neighborhood of Jersey City! Just ½ a block from a Light Rail station, you're just 20 short mins from NYC! It's well maintained, comfortable w/ capacity to sleep 6 guests. Take advantage of the large eat in kitchen w/ cookware, 2 sitting areas, hardwood floors throughout, access to a beautifully manicured lawn w/ fire pit. Amenities also include 55 in Smart TV, USB charging ports and washer & dryer. Welcome home!

The space
1000+ square feet of living space. High ceilings. Lots of natural light if desired. When away from home, guest sometimes want to "veg out". That's why we provide 190 channels on the 55 inch smart tv, as well as super fast wifi speed for the TV, your phone, laptop or other devices you bring .

Guest access
Guest will have access to the entire 1st floor apartment and, laundry room in finished basement, and landscaped backyard with fire pit
neighborhood_overview: LIGHT RAIL STATION is just 1/2 block away.  LIGHT RAIL CAFE is a great neighborhood bar just 1 block away.  Serves great food and drinks.  Definitely give a feel for the diversity of the diversity of people and styles in the area.  CARTERET GROCERY & DELI is right across the street from apartment which is a life saver for all your last minute grabs - Aleve, Pepto, Snacks, Soft Drinks, or a can of pasta sauce!  BERRY LANE PARK just 2 blocks away.  Berry Lane Park is the largest municipal park in Jersey City. Just opened 19 months ago it features include two basketball courts, two tennis courts, baseball field, soccer field, a playground, walk/run course, work out stations, large kid's water splash pad and 600 new trees.

name: Spacious 1br close to Journal Sq (3 stops to NYC)
description:
Recently renovated cozy apartment in peaceful neighborhood in 5min to PATH. From Journal Square you can take PATH train to New York downtown (15 min) or to New York midtown (40 min to Empire State Building). Path works 24/7 hours.

The space
It is the old SSA administration building which was renovated in 2015. With 48 apartments and cool amenities it has all you need to cope with COVID or quarantine yourself.

Guest access
Building have two shared areas: rooftop and basement. Rooftop views are facing Manhattan Skyline and Statue of Liberty and basement has Gym, Billiards, ping-pong, kicker(Foosball), washer/dryer. Washer(2$) and Dryer(1.50$) are paid separately. We will leave a Laundry card that you can refill in laundry room.
neighborhood_overview: Pretty calm area around building: courthouse, college buildings and library.

name: Cove’s Compound /downtown JC. Sleeps 10 6 mins nyc
description:
4 minutes from the Grove Street PATH and sleeps up to 17 people! Whether you have a large group or just like a lot of space, this Compound is for you.
Take over not one but two floors of this 3 story walk up in the ❤️ of Dtown JC! With four bedrooms and 2 working kitchens, Two bathrooms and living rooms also. Perfect for larger groups that need some alone time. Great for multiple families. A large sunny back yard for the kids or a gathering.

The space
This compound is comprised of two separate apartments. The duplex complete with two kitchens, two baths, four bedrooms is four short blocks from Grove street PATH. 6 mins to NYC by train. Awesome restaurants all around. Great bar scene. Family friendly places and activities and museums.

It’s an older walk up building, but has all the basics for a successful stay. If you are looking for new construction this isn’t the place for you. But, if you are budget minded and love a great location at an ama
neighborhood_overview: Terrific restaurants, bars, public parks like Hamilton park, liberty state and van Vorst Park. Museums and NYC are just minutes away by train.
host_location: Jersey City, NJ, Rochester, NY, Cape May, NJ
host_about: Independent business owner since 9/10/2001 along with wife of 15 years and mother of two small wonderful children.  Own a couple buildings in Jersey City and lived full time there for 13 years.  Moved to upstate NY to care for a elderly parent who has recently passed away, so am debating a permanent move back (moving is just so horrible...and takes some time) So, in the meantime have decided to Air BB the apartment that we use when in JC.

Its luxury community offers elegant apartment homes with fabulous features such as granite counter-tops, hardwood floors and walk in closets. name: Modern "hotel suite" type studio apt near Grove st
description:
Beautifully design studio, with state of the art amenities, gives you a hotel suite type feel with a homely atmosphere.

The studio offers comfortable queen size bed and a work desk. Also, the over-sized windows floor to ceiling windows provides sufficient sunlight.
PATH train station is just a 10 min walk. You can take a direct train from here to NYC. Light rail station is across the street, for travel within jersey city.

Studio is set up with a first aid kit, pots & pans, and dinnerware.

The space
Beautifully design studio, with state of the art amenities, gives you a hotel suite type feel with a homely atmosphere, gracious kitchen, spa-like bathrooms and modern appliances. The studio offers comfortable queen size bed and a work desk. Also, the over-sized windows floor to ceiling windows provides sufficient sunlight.

PATH train station is just a 10 min walk. You can take a direct train from here to NYC. Light rail station
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City’s Grove Street is one of the best places to live and merely 7 minutes train ride (PATH) to Manhattan. It has beautiful waterfront,  park, stylish restaurants, cafes, bars, spas and shops. This area has a peaceful appeal with the neighboring Liberty Landing Marina. Also, this area is pretty safe and very livable.

name: Charming Jersey City Apartment, NYC Skyline Views
description:
Charming and cozy apartment in a Victorian home located in the Bergen Hill neighborhood of Jersey City. Beautiful panoramic city views. Close to Journal Square (1 mile) and Downtown JC (1.5 miles). Approximately 20-40 minutes to New York City depending on method of transportation and destination. Large bedroom with queen bed. Smaller 2nd bedroom with day bed that opens to a queen-size bed. The 2nd bedroom is located off the main bedroom. Large living room with queen size air mattress available.

The space
Charming apartment on the 2nd floor of a Victorian home located in the Bergen Hill neighborhood of Jersey City. Beautiful panoramic city views.

Large bedroom with queen size bed.

Smaller 2nd bedroom with day bed that opens to a queen-size bed. The 2nd bedroom is located off the main bedroom. Guests must walk through the main bedroom to enter the 2nd bedroom.

Large living room with queen size air mattress available.
neighborhood_overview:
The home is located on a quiet one-way street. It is a residential neighborhood but still the city. The neighborhood is close to both the Journal Square PATH train station (1 mile away) and Downtown Jersey City (1.5 miles to the Downtown JC Grove St. PATH train).

Although it is still the city, this is a more residential neighborhood and does not feature many cafes and restaurants within close walking distance as opposed to the bustling neighborhood of Downtown Jersey City. We can recommend a few lovely restaurants and cafes within 5-15 minutes walking from the home. Otherwise Downtown Jersey City is just a short 5-7 minute drive or one stop on the PATH train.

The home is located 1 mile from both Lincoln Park and Liberty State Park which features beautiful views of the Stature of Liberty and New York City and ferries to Ellis Island and the Statue.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Hi, we’re Jeff and Vera. We love to travel, exploring new places and visiting friends and family around the world. At home we keep it simple and enjoy listening to music from our vinyl record selection, preferably paired with a nice wine or cocktail.

description:
A private one bedroom apartment close to Hoboken Light Rail and Journal Square Path.

Very close to Central Avenue shopping and directly in front of the 119 bus route to Times Square (NYC).

name: Luxe 1 bedroom apt with amazing NYC views
description:
Brand new building with danish design. Modern and clean. From the 61st floor amazing view of Manhattan!! Very convenient located next to path station to go to the city in minutes24/7 because is minutes from exchange place and Newport subway stations which work with the same NYC subway card.

The space
The amenities are luxurious and I have amazing 80” TV to watch anything you want! The kitchen is fully equipped!
We have washer and dryer for you! In the bedroom there is a full closet.

In the dinning area I have a high table with benches to take advantage of the jaw dropping view!
And I have a little kitten Dasha. She is super friendly and she has automatic food and water dispenser.

Guest access
Gym, pool and especially areas to hang out. This is 24/7 open inside the building on floor 9.

name: BRIGHT HOMEY AND COZY  MINUTES TO NEW YORK  CITY
description:
A beautiful private apartment close to NYC in less than 30 minutes, Buses around the corner, located in a quiet and safe neighborhood, near all stores and Restaurants, Kitchen, bathroom tub/shower, Two double bed-size, 12 inches bed/memory foam mattress, recliner chair and comfortable couch in living room

The space
It's cozy and quiet - you will feel at home upon arrival - Private home with three apartments. This listing is for our second floor apartment which is a walk up

Guest access
You have full access to the entire apartment during your stay. The entire Apartment is only for the use of our guests not share with anyone else

Other things to note
There is only Street parking available and needs a visitor parking permit that cost $5 daily
We have USB plugs available
neighborhood_overview:
This cozy and warm Apt located in a safe neighborhood, on a street full of families and great people. If you are looking for a friendly place to stay while you enjoy the area, we are it! and is close and walking distance to Restaurants and Supermarkets.
It’s two blocks from the bus stop to NYC public transportation takes you to Port Authority 42nd street Times Square buses runs very often every 5 to 8 minutes which We recommend.
"UBER" is in Jersey YAY!!! ;D download the app and travel around for cheap !
host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Kenia and I are parents of three beautiful children.  Our house is a family home that we cherish dearly. 

We love to host and are happy to join the Airbnb community to share our beautiful home with you. 

We enjoy going to museums - having family gatherings, music and of course good food.  

Look forward to having the opportunity to host you. 

Rod & Kenia 

"Live every moment of your life fully"

name: 4BR/2Ba: 20-30 minutes to Times Square, WTC/FiDi
description:
Quick commute to both Midtown and Downtown Manhattan, and more spacious and affordable than other NYC exurbs. Live in a well-equipped, turn-of-the century townhouse in a safe, quiet neighborhood with nearby dining. Every bedroom features ceiling fans, 50-inch LED Roku Streaming LED TVs, and industry-leading gel memory foam mattresses. Living room also has 50-inch LED Roku Streaming LED TV. Utilities and high-speed WiFi included.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century townhouse features ceiling fans in every bedroom, and hardwood floors and porcelain tiles throughout while accentuating old world charm. Each bedroom and the living room feature 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TVs. The gel memory foam mattresses are among the highest rated and most comfortable in the industry. Enjoy a shower underneath the highest rated rain shower head or in the glass-enclosed shower. Plenty of dining space, closet space. Desks available in 3 bedrooms. Digital door locks allow each
neighborhood_overview: Considered the 6th borough of New York City, this neighborhood is closer to Manhattan than many parts of New York City. It is right across the Hudson River from Manhattan with frequent bus service (every 5-10 minutes) to and from Times Square as well as 24/7 PATH train service to World Trade Center, Village, Chelsea, and Herald Square. The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I love to travel, explore, discover new things, and meet new people.  I'm energetic and optimistic.  I love all types of food from Mexican to French, and everything in between.  I enjoy a nice bottle of wine, preferably full-bodied red.  More than anything, aside from family and friends, I love water.  I've been to the beaches of Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Thailand (and California, Florida, and New York, of course), but I can't get enough of white, powder sand beneath my feet, warm ocean breezes blowing gently across my face, and perfectly warm ocean water embracing me.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.

It's a one bedroom apartment with private kitchen and bedroom. It has independent entrance.

Private apartment.

Jersey is a lively city with lots of restaurants, parks and shopping. We are close to Newport Mall and Liberty State Park.

name: Lux 1 Bedroom w/wifi at Newport Jersey City
description:
Overlooking the breathtaking Manhattan skyline & harbor this luxury 40 story high-rise offers great amenities including a community center equipped with billiards, a gaming area and flat screen televisions, as well as a newly renovated fitness center.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Resident lounge
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large newly remodeled fitness center with new equipment
• Sun Deck
• Community room with billiards, gaming area, flat screen TVs, fireplace & computers
• Children's play area with flat screen TV
•On-site restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: ❤️ Tiny House in the Garden | NYC | NJC l NEW
description:
The Garden Tiny House is a designer place, BRAND NEW, and mad COSY! New new new and awesome!

Stay in this charming, Garden Tiny House, a writer’s quaint dream, freshly re-designed and remodeled, while still holding 1900’s character.

Just minutes away from the beautiful Lincoln Park and a walk and a few path train stops away from The West Village and FiDi ( more about that in the Getting Around section )

The space
❤️“We absolutely loved our stay! We booked this for part of our honeymoon & loved it!”
❤️“The place was fantastic for my eleven year old daughter and me. It was exact as the photos shown on the application. It is so nicely decorated, that looks like a fairy tale house.”

Embrace the freedom of minimalistic living in this charming Garden Tiny House. While it has a 250 sq ft surface, it's built in mind with the small footprint principles and feels spacious and sunny. The giant windows offer plenty of natural light and t
neighborhood_overview:
Like the majority of affordable Airbnb listings in Jersey City and Brooklyn, our Tiny House is located in an up and coming neighborhood, further away from the crazy. As it consist of mostly residential houses, it’s quite and friendly. There is a grocery store and a few restaurants a couple of blocks away, and that specific street is in the middle of a gentrification process, but it’s totally safe.
The Lincoln Park around the corner is charming and my personal favorite thing about the neighborhood.
Get away from the busy and noisy Manhattan streets once you’ve enjoyed touristing around and enjoy a walk or morning jog in Lincoln Park! 👟🌳🌸

Street parking is easy to find ( a NYC metro area easy though, please keep that in mind:) )

Getting to NYC is easy peasy!
It takes 25min+ to get to Manhattan, depending on how you decide to get there.

Like driving?
It's about a bit 20 minute drive to get to Manhattan with no traffic.
Like to

Art Director&Designer working in advertising. I love all things pretty, colors and nature.

Me and my hubby like to travel all over the world. We come back inspired to create special experiences and spaces that we love sharing with our guests in the NYC outer area.

name: Luxury Private Jersey City Two Bedroom Apartment
description:
Located at the Jersey City waterfront with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline, these sleek apartments feature spacious, sun-filled floor plans, fully-equipped, gourmet kitchens, and much more. This full lifestyle building offers amenities including a 7th floor terrace with resort-style pool, spa, lounge areas, BBQ grills, double-sided fireplace, and outdoor billiards, a state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio, and a children’s indoor playroom.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large fitness center with new equipment
• Su
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located adjacent to Harsimus Cove Light Rail Station, one block from Newport Centre Mall, and steps from the Newport Path. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Jersey City; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: JerseyCityHts - True Airbnb Experience (Co-exist)
description:
Come join me for some cafe, as you explore the City! The available room is spacious, fitting 4 people comfortably, with TV, air-conditioner, Wifi, closet, private entrance to the private room, double/single sized air mattress upon request. Ideal for travelers looking to experience NYC without the expensive cost to stay in NYC. Public transportation into the City is 10/20 mins depending on traffic/route! Public Transportation leaves you right at the heart of NYC, at Times square!

The space
The apartment is a "rail road" style apartment, with two separate entrance to the apartment. We're on the second floor (but the stairs aren't that steep). Guests will be able to go and come as they please using the door closest to your room! This apartment is officially a 2 bedroom apartment however the second bedroom is bigger than usual, which is where you would be staying at!

Guest access
Everyone is welcomed to use the kitchen,living room, restroom. I
neighborhood_overview: Jersey Heights is really a underrated neighborhood. The real value is being able to kind of get away from the City and enjoy the view from the park right around the corner! This location is great for anyone looking to experience the city but also feel like you can get away from it. At Jersey Heights we have bars/coffee spots within walking distant ("fox&crow", "modcup coffee", "the cliff"). You can take a nice short walk to the park and enjoy the view of the city and some coffee. We also have citi bikes that can get you around from Jersey Heights to Hoboken.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Come hang out with me and my parents! We would love to share a glass of wine and talk about your travels! I personally love having my parents stay with me and enjoy their presence, needless to say I'm very family oriented. I have a passion for digital marketing (my day job) and cook ( my weekend job as a kitchen assistant for Institute of culinary education). I love reading books across multiple genres, I actually started hosting after reaching the airbnb story written by Leigh Gallagher! 

I personally love traveling, the type of travels I tend to do varies based on the crowd that's tagging along. Personally some of my favorite experience came from traveling alone to other parts of the world. Nothing beats having to survive and meet new people like traveling on your own. It's an exhilarating feeling to come into something new and have the opportunity to feel comfortable/immersed into another culture!

name: Stylish Jersey City Apartment Close to NYC
description:
Cozy apartment steps away from transportation to midtown Manhattan. Close to stores, restaurants and parks in the thriving Jersey City Heights neighborhood. French-speaking hosts.

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and is very well appointed. It is a garden-level apartment with a lot of light in the front of kitchen/living room.

Guest access
Guests will access the apartment through their own door (at garden level) and will also have access to our Washer and Dryer that are located just outside the unit.

Other things to note
If you are flying into Newark Airport, this is the perfect location as we are about 20 minutes away from the airport with easy and relatively inexpensive transportation options (Taxi and public Transportation). Note that we are a good two hours away from JFK and LaGuardia airports .
neighborhood_overview:
The Jersey City Heights area is comprised mostly of two and three family houses, and remains traditionally middle-class. Perched high atop the palisades on the western banks of the Hudson River, the Heights sits 100 feet above sea level and the City of Hoboken. Along the east are Palisade and Ogden Avenues, both of which offer stunning views of the Manhattan skyline especially when standing in Riverview Fisk Park.

"The Heights" is characterized as a traditional and mixed neighborhood community. The Central Avenue shopping district is home to more than 240 storefront businesses. Bordering the North end of the Heights is County owned Washington Park. Pershing Field park is located in the center of this district offering green space, baseball fields, an Olympic size swimming pool and ice skating rink. Adjacent to Pershing Field Park is Reservoir#3 which constitutes one of the largest patches of green space in the Heights.

name: Newly-Renovated, Modern 1BR Apt in Prime Location
description:
Our newly-renovated, modern one-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment is situated in the garden level of a historic 200-year-old row house. The space features an open concept living room and kitchen, washer/dryer, queen bedroom, and full shower. Located on a tree-lined street in downtown Jersey City, the apartment is close to a beautiful park, trendy restaurants and bars, and shops and grocery stores. Paid parking is available nearby, and the PATH train into Manhattan is just a quick walk away!

The space
Our home is a recently renovated two-family historic wood row house. The home is set back from the street about 50 feet. You have a private entrance to the garden level apartment. The bedroom and living space each have individually remote-controlled heating and A/C units, so you have full control of temperature regulation. There is also a washer/dryer in the apartment. The kitchen has a full-sized refrigerator, range, dishwasher, microwave, drip coffee maker, and basic
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the historic neighborhood of Hamilton Park in Downtown Jersey City. The apartment is two blocks away from the park, which has tennis courts, a basketball court, a large playground, plenty of tree-shaded grassy areas for a picnic, and a farmers market on Wednesdays from May through November. Newark Avenue, a pedestrian-only street with lots of trendy restaurants and bars, is an 8-minute walk away. The Newport Mall, with plenty of shopping options and a large movie theater, is three blocks away. There are a number of other restaurants, as well as some great ice cream shops and several local coffee shops, within walking distance. There are also two grocery stores located within five blocks of the apartment (ShopRite and Key Food). See "Getting around" for transportation specifics.

neighborhood_overview: The tiny section of Jersey City called Paulus Hook was originally settled in 1633 by the Dutch West India Company, who later elected Michael Paulusen (i.e. Paulaz), as the leader of the region. Paulusen operated a ferry boat and traded with the Lenepe people in the area, and is responsible for its name {Paulus Hook comes from the anglicization of Paulusen’s last name, with the “hook” designation describing the small island area seen at high tide in the early 1600s}. Through the late 1700s, Paulus Hook continued to thrive off a busy ferry service that spanned the mile journey along the water to New York City, while the Battle of Paulus Hook took place in 1779, and marked an advantageous battle for the United States during the Revolutionary War. During the late 1800s, an influx of immigrants moved to the area, which would later provide the fabric of the cultural diversity still present in JC today.

name: Jersey City NJ | Luxury 1 Bedroom Apt w/ Amenities
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.
neighbourhood: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

name: Luxury Furnished 2 Bedroom Apartment Jersey City
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Spacious 4BR home 30 mins from NYC! Parking avail!
description:
Cozy home perfect for a getaway or holidays around NYC: 30 mins to NYC. 4 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath. Sleeps 6-14. Private coded entrance.

Our home features a collection of brand new appliances, filled with high end beauty products, great tea/coffee and amenities! 25 mins from World Trade Center, 35-40 mins from Times Square & 20 mins from Newark Airport.

Extra $25/day 2-car max garage parking available with advance notice. Large vans are different.

Jersey City Short Term Rental Permit STR20-00032

The space
Welcome the metro New York City area in the heart of New Jersey!
*As a note: we are working extra hard to provide cleanliness and safety during Covid and can assure guests we follow all rules/guidelines set by airbnb including extra time between guests.

With a bus stops within three blocks of our home, get to Port Authority (Times Square) in 30-40 minutes OR World Trade Center, Macy's, Union Square, The West Village
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is close to NYC and has a variety of public transportation options. Neighboring Hoboken and downtown Jersey City are both easy 15 minute walks and have plenty of lovely options for dining and entertainment. 20 minutes from Newark airport.

We are 6 miles from MetLife stadium, home to the Giants and Jets. Appr. 15 minutes via Uber or car.

We provide maps and bus/train instructions for NYC travel. The fastest to Herald Square (Macys's) is (a) 16 min walk to PATH at Journal Square, then 20 min train to 33rd street. Or take 3 minute bus to PATH for faster service. PATH drops at Christopher Street, 9th street, 14th street (Union Square), 23rd street and 33rd street (Macy's). There is also a separate Path Service line directly to the World Trade Center (about 10 minutes on the train).

There are also direct buses that get you to Times Square (Port Authority) in about 35 to 45 minutes that pickup directly outside of our street.

I hail from the midwest (Wisconsin) and love ice cream, cheese and the Packers.  Ted is from Brooklyn and knows everything about NYC + he was an MLB baseball player. We live for country music, half marathons and live music.  We hope to see you at our home or yours! Our goal as Airbnb hosts is to give a purely local and delightful home-away-from-home. See you soon!

name: Tiny House - Private Entry - Isolate close to NYC
description:
Welcome to the Tiny House in Jersey City! 150 stylish square feet are ready to be your jump-off point for exploring New York City. You'll have a queen-size bed, full bath, outdoor space, kitchenette with mini-fridge and microwave (NO STOVE) and access to a washer/dryer.

The space
The Tiny House has a great location and offers tremendous bang for your buck. It is in an awesome neighborhood in Jersey City where new restaurants, bars and cafes are opening daily. You're near Hamilton Park and the graceful, tree and brownstone lined streets surrounding it. And to top it all off, you are 30 minutes door-to-door to the World Trade Center and 40 minutes door-to-door to the Empire State Building and Highline.

Guest access
You can access the whole Tiny House (of course), the washer and dryer in the garage and the lower patio outside the house shown in the pictures. The patio is shared with another Airbnb.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the Village, the hottest and best neighborhood in Jersey City. The neighborhood is made up of historic brownstones and rowhouses, with glamorous condo building starting to spring up. Beautiful Hamilton park is a few blocks away.

Just across the street from the Tiny House, a new restaurant row is forming, anchored by Madame Claude's and the recently relocated Prato Cafe (the delicious cantucci cookies are a must). Further down Newark Ave and towards Grove Street, a host of bars and restaurants await (Porta, Razza and Broa are among the best). Although I'm partial to Prato, 9Bar, Dimes and Lackawanna are all good coffee shops in the area.

The space
Cleaning, Disinfection and Sterilization Procedures
• Each room is treated with commercial-grade UVC sanitizing germicidal light as well as an ozone treatment, then fully ventilated for a hospital-grade sanitization. This process disinfects hard and soft surfaces, such as couches, furniture and draperies.
• Housekeepers perform a deep cleaning and sanitization between each stay.
• Bedroom linens, towels, kitchen towels and bath mats are washed and fully sanitized, all mattresses and pillows are covered with mattress and pillow covers for an extra layer of protection.
• Amenities such as shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottl

If you are reading this, the room or another room in our home is AVAILABLE! The way Airbnb works is that it shows you only what is available on the dates you en
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

neighborhood_overview: The tiny section of Jersey City called Paulus Hook was originally settled in 1633 by the Dutch West India Company, who later elected Michael Paulusen (i.e. Paulaz), as the leader of the region. Paulusen operated a ferry boat and traded with the Lenepe people in the area, and is responsible for its name {Paulus Hook comes from the anglicization of Paulusen’s last name, with the “hook” designation describing the small island area seen at high tide in the early 1600s}. Through the late 1700s, Paulus Hook continued to thrive off a busy ferry service that spanned the mile journey along the water to New York City, while the Battle of Paulus Hook took place in 1779, and marked an advantageous battle for the United States during the Revolutionary War. During the late 1800s, an influx of immigrants moved to the area, which would later provide the fabric of the cultural diversity still present in JC today.

host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

name: Jersey City Apartment Close to Path Train to NYC
description:
Spacious one bedroom apartment ideal for an individual or couple visiting New York City or Jersey City. The apartment is a ten minute walk or short Uber to the Journal Square Path station which has you in New York City in 15 minutes. Door-to-door you can be in the West Village or World Trade Center in less than half-an-hour. The apartment is also a 20 minute walk to both the Hoboken Waterfront and the vibrant Downtown Jersey City neighborhood. With NYC views as well, this place has great value!

The space
You will have the entire apartment to yourself: common area, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. There is also a common outdoor patio and basement laundry if you need to use it. You'll need to bring the building key with you to access these spaces. You must purchase a $20 laundry card to do laundry, but we can also make arrangements to leave my card if you Venmo me per cycle used.
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City Heights is a great neighborhood located on a cliff above Hoboken with Hoboken, Jersey City, and New York City views (the apartment has New York City views).
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello!

My name is Ryan and I am a teacher and basketball coach here in New Jersey. I lived in Brooklyn for many years and moved to my current apartment in Jersey City a year ago.

I enjoy traveling a lot so when my apartment is available it's usually because I am off on an adventures somewhere else. When I'm home, I am out enjoying the adventures NYC has to offer pretty much every weekend, or exploring more of Jersey City. 

Jersey City is great! It's pretty much like living in another borough of the city and am super happy with my move. There is a lot to do in the area and with the Journal Square path close by and NJ transit bus up the block, you can be in the city in 30 minutes door-to-door. I hope you get to enjoy my place!

Ryan

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

The apartment has brand new kitchen appliances & a washer, dryer in the unit. The neighborhood offers several great places to eat and grab drinks, parks with city views, not to mention that the lively Hoboken is just a 5 minute Uber ride away.

The space

neighborhood_overview: New Jersey City Heights is a quiet and safe neighborhood that offers several trendy hang-out spots like the ones shown in the photos. You can step out for coffee, drinks and live music or some delicious fine dining. There are several parks nearby with nice city views and CitiBike rentals. If you want to be in the thick of action you can take a 5 min Uber to the heart of Hoboken or walk there in 15 min by taking an elevator that is located 3 blocks away. There are plenty of laundry places, corner stores and grocery places in the neighborhood.

neighborhood_overview: The tiny section of Jersey City called Paulus Hook was originally settled in 1633 by the Dutch West India Company, who later elected Michael Paulusen (i.e. Paulaz), as the leader of the region. Paulusen operated a ferry boat and traded with the Lenepe people in the area, and is responsible for its name {Paulus Hook comes from the anglicization of Paulusen’s last name, with the “hook” designation describing the small island area seen at high tide in the early 1600s}. Through the late 1700s, Paulus Hook continued to thrive off a busy ferry service that spanned the mile journey along the water to New York City, while the Battle of Paulus Hook took place in 1779, and marked an advantageous battle for the United States during the Revolutionary War. During the late 1800s, an influx of immigrants moved to the area, which would later provide the fabric of the cultural diversity still present in JC today.

Newly renovated private apartment in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This spacious one bedroom is located on the second floor of a three story house and is one block from transit that takes you into NYC in just 30 minutes. The neighborhood is safe and quiet, yet there are a few hip places to eat and have fun. We are three blocks from an elevator that brings you down to Hoboken - a prime neighborhood that also offers plenty of entertainment and gorgeous city views.

The space

You can step out for coffee, drinks and live music or some delicious fine dining. There are several parks nearby with nice city views and CitiBike rentals. If you want to be in the thick of action you can take a 5 min Uber to the heart of Hoboken or walk there in 15 min by taking an elevator that is located 3 blocks away. There are plenty of laundry places, corner stores and grocery places in the neighborhood.

I am currently pursuing a degree in Hospitality, Management, & Entrepreneurship, graduation 2018. It is my life's pursuit to make the everyone's day a little brighter. I love to travel, meet new people, and just live. My favorite thing to do is, learn about the cultures of others where I visit,  and those who visit me.

My long term goal is to acquire international properties and luxury SUVs to manage & rent them. I actually embarked on hosting a condo in the always beautiful, Dominican Republic. 

I am moving one step at a time, one reservation at a time. I have been on this journey since September 2015 .Each guest that stays with me or rents one of my vehicles helps me get closer to my dreams. 

I sincerely appreciate anyone who decides to reserve one of my homes. 

I hope your stay is a dream come true too!

description:
15 Minutes to NYC and Hoboken

Beautiful lux condo with Premium Adjustable Bed with massage and remote! 2 Beds and 2 Baths, patio+. You will have private access to the entire unit for your stay.

SmartHome upgrades - have fun while relaxing at home and speaking directly to your TVs.

Organic, allergy-free and non-toxic upgrades throughout the home, including all linens, washings, & soaps.

The space
This luxury condominium was once the highest price per square foot in the history of Jersey City Heights.

Pictures are approximate as brand new listing and new pictures are on the way!

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a beautiful, growing artist community right above Hoboken. This luxury condo is located right in the formal Riverview Arts District and has numerous coffee places, cafes, restaurants, juice bars, and dessert places opening regularly.

Right at the corner on Palisade Avenue are regular private buses into Port Authority, New York City. These buses take about 15-20 minutes, come every few minutes, and are about $3 per person.

Also right at the corner is NJ Transit Buses Route 123 which goes to Port Authority for $4.50, but you must have exact change.

NJ Transit App can be downloaded for routes and fares as well as CityMapper app.

A few blocks to Franklin Street and there will be new stairs to the 2nd Street Light Rail Station in Hoboken, you can take the rail to the path or ferry and get to Downtown or Midtown Manhattan. This makes for a possibly nicer trip, plus the benefits of access to the entire Gold Coast of New

description:
Spacious private 1 bedroom apartment on 1st floor in Jersey City brownstone.

This apartment has a private entrance, full kitchen, living room and bathroom.

My partner, Hamlet and our dog Precious live in a different apartment in the building and are mostly available throughout your stay.

We work regular hours, so we ask for noise consideration, especially during weeknights.

Se habla espanol.

The space
This 1 bedroom apartment has a private entrance in the front and a back door with access to the backyard. It has a bathroom, kitchen and living room.

The bedroom boasts a plush queen size bed and a roll-out single sleeper, perfect for 3 traveling friends or family members. It has a workstation where guests can work from their laptops and charge their devices.

The roll-out can be situated in the bedroom or living room. The living room has a door and can be converted into a completely private room f
neighborhood_overview: This is Jersey City's Greenville neighborhood. This block is quiet and beautifully lined with brick townhouses. It is residential, close to parks and public transportation to NYC. This neighborhood is not close to shops or restaurants. Please note before booking that this neighborhood is about a 12-15 minute drive/bus ride to Journal Square where the PATH train to NYC can be taken.
host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about:
My partner Hamlet and I love traveling, photos, dancing and learning about different cultures. We have made amazing connections with people in near and far and it's why we decided to Air bnb our Casa Cultura Lovers. 

Find us on (Hidden by Airbnb) to learn a little bit more about us: @CulturaLovers 
You can also listen to our podcast on your favorite podcast app: Cultura Lovers
