name: Mins to NYC, Gorgeous Downtown Apartment
description:
Welcome to the heart of Jersey City’s Historic Powerhouse Arts District! Stay in our comfy, convenient, luxurious 1BD/1BA residence in The Art House.

Jersey City offers some the best East Coast eateries, bars, shops & entertainment! You are just a short 4-min walk to the PATH train station taking you directly into NYC or Hoboken.

Plus, we’re just 11 miles from Newark International Airport, making The Art House the perfect choice for families and business travelers alike! *Limited Parking*

The space
Bright, spacious & beautifully designed, our 1BR/1BA residence is perfect for relaxing vaca or focused business travel, or both! There is a QUEEN SIZE bed in the master and a sleeper sofa in the living area, accommodating up to 4 guests. Your stay conveniently includes travel-sized soaps, shampoo & conditioner.

The Art House apartment community is home to both long-term residents and short-term guests. Professionally hosted, Guesthous
neighborhood_overview:
The Art House is located in the heart of the Historic Powerhouse Arts District. Vibrant, energetic and so many options for getting brunch, lunch, dinner, coffee, going out, working out and more. Hidden Grounds Cafe, Gelato, Micro-Brewery, Kickboxing, HIIT, Yoga, Pilates all next door. *Noise Note: You are located in the center of a bustling city, so you can expect city noises.*

Nearby Newark Ave is a dedicated pedestrian area that features many local restaurants, bars, and boutique shops. Pick up fresh Krispy Cream donuts on your walk to the PATH. So much to explore & enjoy! Extremely walkable, excellent public transit options including Citi Bikes.

*Parking Note: Metered Street Parking is available, but the street is busy and often full. Check for street sweeping signs to know when to move your vehicle. Paid lots and garages are available in the nearby area.*

Check out the local arts, music & events scene!

Here are a few of our favorites:

name: Newly renovated apartment - 10 minutes to NYC
description:
Modern and minimalist apartment, completely renovated in 2019. Sleeps 4: two twin beds in the common area, queen bed in the separate bedroom. Plenty of closet space. European-style bathroom. Kitchenette (with goodies for breakfast and late-night snacks), dining set for 4, workspace (high speed internet), and smart TV in the common area. 10 minute walk to the Path (subway) station; 2 stops to Manhattan.

The space
The motto of the apartment is: Everything guests need, and nothing they don't. Based on the owners extensive travel experiences, guests need a clean, comfortable place that combines convenience with practicality. What they don't need is having their surroundings cluttered with the owner's personal belongings and/or items that they are unlikely to use during their stay. Hence, the apartment strives to prove that 'simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.'

The Local Stay, founded in 2008 to make the process of renting furnished short- and long-term apartments absolutely transparent, so renters and property owners alike can rest easy.
At The Local Stay, our goal is to take the guess work out of it, carefully curating apartments so that travelers experience the true pulse of the city. And, since each property owner is personally vetted by The Local Stay team, travelers can rest assured that their stays will be safe and secure. Better vetting means that travelers get the most exclusive apartments in the most central locations, while greater involvement by The Local Stay means that property owners can list it and leave it as we handle communication with renters.
Today, The Local Stay offers hundreds of short-term and long-term rental properties in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Buenos Aires, London, New York, New-Jersey, Paris, Rome, Tel Aviv and more.... Our apartments inventory includes both corporate apartments and privately owned flats, making The Local Stay the perfect option for business travelers, corporate relocation clients and those on sabbatical, as well as foreign students and families on holiday. With options for everyone, The Local Stay provides personalized service so that every traveler can stay like a local.

name: Spacious Room in Journal Square - Close to PATH
description:
This listing for a Private room at The Journal Square House the most recent addition to the Outpost Club family. This house consists of six apartments spread across three houses, with two floors each. With easy access to public transportation, it’s the perfect base from which to commute to Lower and Midtown Manhattan. Members enjoy spacious common areas with plenty of entertainment options, as well as a large backyard with plenty of room to lounge or host a barbecue.

The space
Outpost Club is a network of coliving locations throughout New Jersey. Our goal is to make it super easy to move to New Jersey, and to provide interesting and convenient places for affordable prices. But at Outpost Club, you receive more than just a place to live and work. The Outpost Club platform creates a Coliving community that offers both general and professional networking, which personally benefits all members.

Guest access
Outpost Club provides end-to-end co-
neighborhood_overview: This coliving house is located in the revitalized Journal Square neighborhood, filled with historic buildings, newer high rises and plenty of dining options. It’s only a short commute into New York City on public transportation and is an easy commute to downtown Jersey City and Hoboken.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
At Outpost Club, we believe that finding a place to live should be as easy as buying a cup of coffee. 
Founded in 2016 by a team who knows what it’s like to move we spent our careers traveling around the world, working remotely and building start-ups.
Outpost Club was launched by three entrepreneurs who understands the challenges of moving to new places, working remotely and building a start-up from scratch in a new place. Our mission is to build a tight-knit community with shared passions and visions, thereby making the world we live in a better place. Apply today, move in tomorrow. Our spaces are cleaned regularly and restocked with all the essentials. Flexibility and convenience matched with beautiful spaces and new friends, that’s what we’re all about for the thousands of guests we’ve served.

name: Park Views - Private 4 bed/2 bath - 30 mins to NYC
description:
My place is steps away from Lincoln Park and Saint Peter's University. You’ll love it because of the views, the coziness, the high ceilings, and the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids) and big groups.

Uber/Lyft pickup within 5 minutes or less, Citi bike rental nearby, Fastest public transportation route to NYC takes 30 minutes. TV and Wi-Fi.

Professionally cleaned after each stay.

The space
4 Bedrooms, Cozy Living Room with large bay windows, Dining Room, Kitchen w/ Park Views and full Bathroom.

The apartment is kept immaculate and is cleaned after every guest. Fresh bedding and towels provided. Steps away from Lincoln Park where there is a Farmers Market every Sunday, Running/Walking Nature trail, and also a bike lane throughout the park. You can park on the street or overnight free parking in Lincoln Park.
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located on the edge of Beautiful Lincoln Park. A very large place where you can enjoy a variety of leisure actives, from a morning jog or scenic walk to tennis, golf, cycling, basketball, baseball, football, soccer, picnicking, sunbathing, fishing (in the Hackensack River), bird watching, kayaking or even Pokemon Go!

The West Side neighborhood, north of Lincoln Park, is a quiet residential district with small to medium shops on West Side Avenue, Duncan Avenue and Communipaw. These avenues contain delis (bodegas), supermarkets, convenience stores, laundromats, pizzerias, Asian fast food, Mcdonald's churches, pharmacies, bars, liquor stores, nail salon, and beauty parlors.

Directly south of Lincoln Park, immediately west of Route 440 is Hudson Mall, which hosts large outlets like Old Navy, Staples, Chuck e Cheese, Marshall's, ToysRus, Gamestop, Big Lots, Lowes, Foot Locker, Pep Boys, Applebee's, Pizza Hunt, Popeyes, Taco bell, Hibachi Grill Buffet and

name: 116 Magnolia Ave 7A
description:
Private room with double bed and sink in the room located in our Century old Guest/Rooming House that has been renovated.

We also have a laundry room for your use (for a fee) on premises and we will provide you with a refillable laundry card.
neighborhood_overview:
We are a Century’s old Guest/Rooming House that has been renovated. We offer European style rooms with shared bathrooms and Continental styled rooms with private bathrooms.
All rooms have microwave ovens, mini refrigerators, desk and chair, Iron, blow dryer, heat and air conditioning (in the summer and spring), sheets, comforter, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, plastic utensils, plates, bowls, cups, toilet paper and free Wi-Fi.
We also have a laundry room for your use (for a fee) on premises and we will provide you with a refillable laundry card.

The property is clean, safe and secure and is located in a quiet tree-lined residential neighborhood only one block from 24 hour Journal Square ( JSQ) PATH train station. In the PATH station there is a 24 hour Deli/Café and several Deli, coffee shops and stores within walking distance as well as the local police station.

Enjoy a stay with Zeus! We have 3770+ reviews (see below).

host_location: San Francisco, California, United States
host_about:
We built Zeus Living so you can feel at home wherever opportunity takes you. Whether it’s for a month, a year, or sometime in between, you can count on a thoughtfully designed home and a comfortable, easy stay. Our technology helps us select homes you’ll love in ideal locations at a good value, while our expert team handles all the details. Based in San Francisco, and operating in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York City, Seattle, Boston, and Washington, D.C.


** 
PLEASE NOTE: Many of our homes are pet friendly, which you will see listed under "House Rules". If you do plan to bring your furry friend(s), we have a one-time non-refundable $500 pet fee and have a limit of 2 pets max. We have several dog breed restrictions. Most of our dog-friendly homes do not allow American Pit bulls, Rottweilers, Akitas, Cane Corsos, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Staffordshire Terriers, Dobermans, German Shepherds, Boxers, Malamutes, Huskies, Dalmatians, Chow Chows, Fila Brasileiros, or Wolf hybrids. We encourage individuals with service animals or one of the breeds listed as restricted to contact us before booking.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just across the Hudson River from New York City, some refer to Jersey City as the sixth borough. Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is a go-to spot for tourists.
Due to its location, one hundred feet above sea level on the western side of the Hudson River, residents get to enjoy beautiful scenic views of the Manhattan skyline from one side and beautiful marshes and meadowlands on the other side. Variety of public transportation options like the PATH Train, New Jersey Transit’s  Light Rail, and public buses make your traveling to New York City, downtown Jersey City, or Hoboken quick and convenient. Take the stairs off Paterson Plank Road to Hoboken’s 2nd Street Light Rail Station or the elevator at Congress Street to the 9th Street Light Rail Station to easily commute around Hoboken, Weehawken, Jersey City, Bayonne and beyond! New Jersey Transit bus routes also serve this neighborhood, with several major lines to help you zip around locally

neighborhood_overview:
Located just across the Hudson River from New York City, some refer to Jersey City as the sixth borough. Jersey City's Heights section exemplifies convenient, commuter friendly living in a timeless charming neighborhood! Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is a go-to spot for tourists.
Due to its location, one hundred feet above sea level on the western side of the Hudson River, residents get to enjoy beautiful scenic views of the Manhattan skyline from one side and beautiful marshes and meadowlands on the other side. Variety of public transportation options like the PATH Train, New Jersey Transit’s Light Rail, and public buses make your traveling to New York City, downtown Jersey City, or Hoboken quick and convenient. Take the stairs off Paterson Plank Road to Hoboken’s 2nd Street Light Rail Station or the elevator at Congress Street to the 9th Street Light Rail Station to easily commute around Hoboken, Weehawken, Jersey City, Bayonne and beyond! name: Private Urban Oasis w/ Backyard / 15 min to NYC
description:
Welcome to my home!

Just 15 steps away from the apartment and you get the bus that takes around 15 minutes to Time Square!!! Newark Int'l Airport is around a 20 minute drive away. As for local travel, a 5 minute walk away is the Lightrail to get around Jersey City. There is free street parking but you have to be mindful of the street signs.

The apartment has a keyless entry so I am flexible and can make accommodations re. check in, check out, leaving bags, etc. Just ask :)

The space
The private apartment gives you the warm feeling of a home away from home while on vacation. The backyard is great to relax or have a bbq. The apartment is completely private and you have exclusive use of the entire floor and a private part of the backyard. As for added bonuses, I provide a Keurig machine and blackout curtains throughout the apartment. I provide the following to name a few: towels, shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, toiler paper, blow dryer, pap
neighborhood_overview: My area of Jersey City is very vibrant, eclectic and diverse, with nice cafes and restaurants and it is safe. In the apartment is a brochure which provides information for local spots. Some of my favorite local spots are within a couple of blocks of the apartment. Corto restaurant is a favorite and has a farm to table menu, outdoor seating in the backyard and it is BYOB. Fox and Crow is a nice burger spot that has a parlor in the backroom where you can enjoy live music on Friday and Saturday nights. Milk Sugar Love is an organic ice cream shop. Also, Riverview Park, just one block away, provides great views of Manhattan, especially at night.

name: Downtown JC-Minutes to NYC!! - Unit Two
description:
If you haven't been to Downtown Jersey city it's a destination in of itself. There are tons of bars & restaurants. We're a 5 minute walk to Jersey City's Restaurant Row. A 7 minute walk to the Grove Street PATH Train (which gets you into NYC in less than 10 minutes) and a 15 minute walk to the waterfront facing NYC's Freedom Tower.

The space

neighborhood_overview: Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple, but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.

host_location: Israel
host_about:
The Local Stay, founded in 2008 to make the process of renting furnished short- and long-term apartments absolutely transparent, so renters and property owners alike can rest easy.
At The Local Stay, our goal is to take the guess work out of it, carefully curating apartments so that travelers experience the true pulse of the city. And, since each property owner is personally vetted by The Local Stay team, travelers can rest assured that their stays will be safe and secure. Better vetting means that travelers get the most exclusive apartments in the most central locations, while greater involvement by The Local Stay means that property owners can list it and leave it as we handle communication with renters.
Today, The Local Stay offers hundreds of short-term and long-term rental properties in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Buenos Aires, London, New York, New-Jersey, Paris, Rome, Tel Aviv and more.... Our apartments inventory includes both corporate apartments and privately owned flats, making The Local Stay the perfect option for business travelers, corporate relocation clients and those on sabbatical, as well as foreign students and families on holiday. With options for everyone, The Local Stay provides personalized service so that every traveler can stay like a local.

host_about:
I am a young entrepreneur, I manage properties and vehicles by day, I go to school at night. I work hard in everything I do, I think im an extremely helpful individual. I was naturally born to provide hospitality/customer service/sales, at least that's how I feel! 

I am currently pursuing a degree in Hospitality, Management, & Entrepreneurship, graduation 2018. It is my life's pursuit to make the everyone's day a little brighter. I hope your stay is a dream come true too!

name: Stylish Studio in Jersey City w/ Gym, close to NYC
description:
Quinn Apartments is located in the desirable neighborhood of Paulus Hook. Here you can enjoy a more small-town vibe while also having quick and easy access to New York City. Within walking distance, you can reach the waterfront, public transportation (light rail & PATH), and many diverse eateries and coffee shops. Also close by is the popular Van Vorst Park Dog Run, where you can take your furry friend for some exercise and socializing. In addition to a great location, this community offers many in-unit and building amenities that will make you feel comfortable, safe, and happy to here.

Enjoy a stay with Zeus! We have 3765+ reviews (see below).

The space
At Zeus, we offer thoughtfully furnished homes for 30+ day stays.

Our homes come equipped with handpicked essentials, from premium mattresses and linens to kitchen basics like pots and pans, chef’s knives, and wine glasses. Your home is also equipped with high-speed WiFi and cleaning suppl
host_location: San Francisco, California, United States
host_about:
We built Zeus Living so you can feel at home wherever opportunity takes you. Whether it’s for a month, a year, or sometime in between, you can count on a thoughtfully designed home and a comfortable, easy stay. Our technology helps us select homes you’ll love in ideal locations at a good value, while our expert team handles all the details. Based in San Francisco, and operating in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York City, Seattle, Boston, and Washington, D.C.


** 
PLEASE NOTE: Many of our homes are pet friendly, which you will see listed under "House Rules". If you do plan to bring your furry friend(s), we have a one-time non-refundable $500 pet fee and have a limit of 2 pets max. We have several dog breed restrictions. Most of our dog-friendly homes do not allow American Pit bulls, Rottweilers, Akitas, Cane Corsos, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Staffordshire Terriers, Dobermans, German Shepherds, Boxers, Malamutes, Huskies, Dalmatians, Chow Chows, Fila Brasileiros, or Wolf hybrids. We encourage individuals with service animals or one of the breeds listed as restricted to contact us before booking.

description:

Tourists, business travelers, locals & their families will enjoy this beautifully decorated L-shaped studio. In addition to the spacious layout and full kitchen, there is a quiet private patio.

A plush queen-sized bed with memory foam mattress and two pull out sofa beds make for a great stay.

The space
This apartment features wi-fi, a 50" flat screen smart TV, central heat & cooling, a private bathroom, and a well-equipped kitchen with coffee and tea provided.

Other things to note
The person who BOOKS the apartment must BE in the apartment. Booking for relatives or other persons is NOT allowed.

Clean, quiet and safe space in the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This apt is a great, affordable option for a bigger group! Enjoy scenic views of Manhattan on the quick 25-minute bus ride to Times Square. The bus stop is direct across the street!!

Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken and Journal Square, with direct PATH train to the city. The brand new apartment is stylishly decorated for your enjoyment. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout.

The space
The apartment was recently built, so everything is brand new and fully functional. The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, bakeware, utensils, tea kettle, and coffee machine. Digital door locks allow each person in your group to come and go as they please without coordinating key exchange. High-Speed WiFi is available. We provide early and late luggage drop off in the luggage closet. There is a washer/dryer in the unit.

Guest access
You'll have
neighborhood_overview: Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.
host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I love meeting new people and traveling. I'm working to fulfill all my dreams! I love rock music. 
I live living and working on a destination New York and Istria. 

Don’t ever let somebody tell you,
you can’t do something.

name: Luxury 1 bed apt in Jersey City Hudson riverfront
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview:
Unit Amenities:

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Nest on Summit
description:
Nest on Summit Ave offers photoshoot rental space only! We do not accommodate overnight stays. Bedroom is offered if needed for shoot. The nest also features a backyard patio that can be used during rental.

If your date is showing as booked, please contact us! The space may only be booked for part of the day.

Half day rental (4 hours): $200 - minimum rental fee.
Each additional hour is $50.00/hour (no more than 8 continuous hours).

We are in the heart of Bergen/ Lafayette District .

The space
Someone will greet you to give you the keys and any additional instructions.

Situated centrally between JSQ and Grove Street path station. Just a fews blocks away from an up and coming neighborhood where you can grab a cup of coffee, shop at nearby mom & pop shops and sightsee historic homes the neighborhood has to offer.

Guest access
Bathroom
Backyard Patio

Other things to note

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

neighborhood_overview:
The Van Vorst Park area is located in the heart of Downtown Jersey City. Vibrant, energetic and so many options for getting brunch, lunch, dinner, coffee, going out, working out and more. Porta, South House, Ibby's Falafel, Wonder Bagels, Wurstbar, Micro-Brewery, HIIT, Yoga, Pilates all next door. *Noise Note: You are located in the center of a bustling city, so you can expect city noises.*

Nearby Newark Ave is a dedicated pedestrian area that features many local restaurants, bars, and boutique shops. Pick up fresh Krispy Cream donuts when the light is on! So much to explore & enjoy! Extremely walkable, excellent public transit options including Citi Bikes.

*Parking Note: Metered Street Parking is available, but the street is busy and often full. Check for street sweeping signs to know when to move your vehicle. Paid lots and garages are available in the nearby area.*

Jersey City is one of the most multicultural diversity city in USA. All types of unique food and services can be find here. For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.

Bus / Uber ride or walk to Journal Square, Hoboken & New Port Path Train Stations. Close to Pershing Field Park, CITI Bike station.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights, "The Heights" is a family friendly and safe area. Our apartment is located on a quiet street. There are a lot of restaurants, groceries, bakeries and supermarket on Central ave which is only half a block away. Pershing Field and the Reservoir, originally constructed in 1871 are cross the street.

Jersey City is one of the most multicultural diversity city in USA. All types of unique food and services can be find here. For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.

description:
Beautiful basement open-plan studio apartment in the Heart of trendy Jersey City Heights. 15 minutes from New York City by Time Square. Close to buses and Path trains to NYC. Shops, restaurants and Cafes 5 minutes from apartment.

The space
Lovely basement s apartment with Exposed Brick accented with wood cabinets and granite counter top. A great open space for hanging out and relaxing. Features a queen size bed and a Queen sized futon. Full Bathroom includes all your bathing needs and kitchen is fully stocked with kitchen essentials.

The space
This ultra-modern Jersey City apartment community is the symbol of comfort and sophistication. Synonymous with luxury, this enclave of elegant apartment homes will welcome you with the finest features, fixtures, and finishes. Building amenities include an exclusive sky bar and lounge, yoga studio, conference rooms, and outdoor areas, which include a pool, grilling areas, fireplace, and outdoor billiards. Services include 24-hour concierge, wifi in common areas, and bike stor
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Comfortable home in Jersey City
description:
The house is two short blocks from the Light Rail (Richard Street Stop) which goes to Hoboken Terminal then a short walk to the PATH (Port Authority Trans Hudson) train into the City. About a 30 minute trip if lucky with the timing! The house has a nice view and a comfortable back yard. As an alternate you can walk 15/20 minutes to the Port Liberte ferry to Bowling Green. I have a Steinway grand (in tune!) and often cook dinner which you'd be welcome to join if you want.

The space
The place is comfortable and clean. I have Netflix and Amazon.
neighborhood_overview: There's a small park next door and Liberty Park is a further distance - has a very nice restaurant 'Liberty House' when allowed to open

name: Zen-Styled Jersey City Apartment - 15 min to NYC
description:
Enjoy our Jersey City 1 bedroom apartment. Our home is fully furnished with a modern zen feel. We are located in the Journal Square neighborhood and across the street from the beautiful Lincoln Park. We are on a quiet street, and blocks away from the Journal Square PATH train station which takes you right into the city in 10 minutes. WiFi is included!

The space
If you are looking to enjoy NYC, the Journal Square PATH train is located a mile away. from here you can be in Manhattan in 10 minutes. Take a nice walk to the train station, ride the bus from the corner, or Uber there in 5 minutes.

Jersey City also has a lot to offer. The Grove Street neighborhood is full of bars and amazing restaurants, and also just a 5 minute Uber down the street.

We are across the street from Lincoln Park, which is full of walking trails, beautiful lawns, ponds, fountains, and basketball & tennis courts.

We are a quick and easy 10 minute Uber to Newar

Uber and the Citibike (on this block) are affordable options to go to the Path Station and downtown, even to Hoboken. This studio is close to Manhattan and offers great value for those venturing into the city. If you are from the suburbs or small cities of the US with no traffic, no crowds, be prepared for big city life. It’s a safe neighborhood.

The neighborhood is safe and trendy. It’s a great neighborhood for New York City commuters and travelers as well as for those that want to enjoy a bit more calmness than Manhattan while being minutes away from it.

Aside from the proximity to the underground transportation with Manhattan and other parts of New Jersey, you will have in less than 5 minutes walk a large diversity of exciting cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, yoga studios, gyms and a great supermarket (Keyfood).

In less than 15 minutes walk you will reach a large shopping mall, a multiplex movie theater, several parks, and the riverside with some of the best views in the New York Metropolitan Area. name: Bright & Large Room for Monthly Stays
description:
Gorgeous, light filled room with a huge walk-in closet for one person. Big bedroom in a shared apartment with 4 other young, clean, professionals. In the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. The bus is half a block away. Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken, with direct PATH train to the city. The room features a Smart TV. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout. The apartment is equipped with central heating/cooling system.
LONGTERM stay only (over 28 days)

The space
The apartment was just built, so everything is brand new and fully functional. The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, bakeware, utensils, tea kettle, and coffee machine. Digital door locks allow each person in your group to come and go as they please without coordinating key exchange. High-Speed WiFi is available. We provide early and late luggage drop off in the luggage closet.

LONGTERM STAYS (OVER 28 DAYS):
- make sure to provide your own toilet pa
neighborhood_overview: ust across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

The living room has two large sofas, one of which is a queen-size pullout sofa bed. The living room TV is 75” and has Roku, with Netflix, Amazon Prime and Disney+ as well.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City, New Jersey, United States.

Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists, and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.

Every CozySuite features modern decor and amenities that make guests feel right at home. We offer accommodations in many cities around the U.S. Have questions? Our guest services team is available 24/7 to help.

name: Upscale apartment home | 1BR in Jersey City
description:
Stay for 30+ nights (minimum nights and rates are FIRM) where you’ll have the entire apartment all to yourself at Cast Iron Lofts. The apartment has beautiful finishes and comes fully outfitted with kitchen, bedroom, & bathroom essentials. Please note, the furnishings & room details WILL VARY as the unit is set up for you upon booking. We are an experienced professional hospitality company that works directly with the property to transform vacant units into your home away from home.

The space
We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. Cleaners wear protective garments (e.g., mask, gloves) and wipe surfaces, cabinet handles, door knobs, etc. with cleaning solutions that follow CDC guidance. All linens, dishware, glassware and silverware are also washed between stays. Cleaning products and tools are provided so you can clean and sanitize as well.

name: Jersey City 's posh single bedroom with a view
description: M2 At Marbella is a post-war rental building in New Jersey's Jersey City neighborhood finished in 2015. Situated at 401 Washington Street, the building contains 311 units and rises 38 stories. The building's amenities include: children's playroom, lounge, fitness center, on-site parking, bike room, game room and terraces / balconies.
host_location: Edison, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi there,

neighborhood_overview: Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple, but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.

description:
Historical, gorgeous, huge, and spacious 2 bedroom/1 full bathroom apartment for up to 4 people with beautiful backyard. There are 2 big bedrooms with an equipped kitchen and dining room. Ideally for a group of working people that need a comfortable and easygoing place to stay. Cheap Uber ride to Hoboken or Journal Square, with direct PATH train to the city. A real historical apartment with plenty of space throughout it. Fully stocked kitchen with living room/dining room. This is ideally placed for a group of people coming for work and needs to live comfortably and independently.

host_about:
At Outpost Club, we believe that finding a place to live should be as easy as buying a cup of coffee. 
Founded in 2016 by a team who knows what it’s like to move we spent our careers traveling around the world, working remotely and building start-ups.
Outpost Club was launched by three entrepreneurs who understands the challenges of moving to new places, working remotely and building a start-up from scratch in a new place. Our mission is to build a tight-knit community with shared passions and visions, thereby making the world we live in a better place. Apply today, move in tomorrow. Our spaces are cleaned regularly and restocked with all the essentials. Flexibility and convenience matched with beautiful spaces and new friends, that’s what we’re all about for the thousands of guests we’ve served.

name: Gorgeous Townhouse Duplex in Historic Paulus Hook
description:
Make yourself at home in this spacious duplex townhouse. Built 1840 with marble fireplaces and wood floors in the heart of historic Paulus Hook. Light, spacious and modern with south-facing aspect and 10-foot ceilings throughout. Only minutes to the Hudson River and views of the whole of Manhattan, or head to the private roof terrace for views of Ellis Island and the Statue of Liberty. Stylish, peaceful, and perfectly positionned for Manhattan or the many local cafes and restaurants.

The space
Spacious duplex on quiet tree-lined street with front yard, back yard, and roof terrace. atones throw to Manhattan, or right in the middle of charming and historic Paulus Hook neighborhood.

Guest access
Guests have access to private roof terrace, and shared access to front and back yards, plus washer dryer in building.
neighborhood_overview: Paulus Hook is a hidden gem on Manhattan's doorstep, with cafes, restaurants, and waterfront views of the city.  Located just 10 minutes to Wall St and downtown by ferry or subway, or 20 minutes by subway to the West Village.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We're a fun-loving couple with a passion for travel, writing, and music. 

We moved to NYC a few years ago, and eventually settled in Jersey City -- a gem of a neighborhood, right on the door step of Manhattan, with views of the city, Hudson River, and park, but with its own bars, restaurants and cafes. 

We enjoy hanging out in our neighborhood, and also exploring the city and  everything it has to offer!

description:
Come stay at our home for a moment in the past! Something different than the day-to-day life! Close to downtown JC and NYC for all sorts of restaurants and bars.

The space
The entire duplex showing the pictures.

Guest access
Your entrance is through the backyard door through the alley next to the building and the empty lot. we live in the front of the building so please do not go through the front door. The backyard is our space but you are welcome to take a chair to enjoy a bit of the oasis. My mother loves gardening and planting in the summer time so it is nice to enjoy a cup of coffee there

Other things to note
We have no smoking house rule, if you do want to smoke, please go outside of the house, the BALCONY is not allowed for smoking as well. You can do that in backyard but ensure all windows and doors are closed to avoid the smell come back inside

It is also closer to major attractions suchs as Statue of Liberty, NYC (World Trade Center, Time Square, MET) and all other boroughs in NYC, with much more affordable cost of staying.

name: Modern Studio in Historic Downtown Jersey City
description:
This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 20 years of experience in the industry. The upscale, pet-friendly building’s amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, fitness center with yoga studio, children's playroom, pool with sundeck, billiards room, lounge and more. The surrounding area of downtown Jersey City is vibrant and historic, with plenty of restaurants, museums, shopping and parks waiting to be explored. The PATH train, located mere steps from the apartment building, provides a 10-20 minute ride into Manhattan.

The space
This vibrant studio is located in a luxury building in the lively Grove Street neighborhood of Jersey City. The apartment features stainless steel kitchen appliances, white matte finish kitchen cabinets, cashmere white countertops, gray subway tile backsplash, LED lighting throughout, hardwood floors, roller-shade windo
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. It is also one of the most ethnically diverse cities in the world, with large populations of Hispanic, Asian and Indian Americans. The Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) train, a 24-hour s

neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. It is also one of the most ethnically diverse cities in the world, with large populations of Hispanic, Asian and Indian Americans. The Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) train, a 24-hour s

name: Luxury Condo Room for Rent + Private Bathroom
description:
Room and private bathroom available for rent in Jersey City in Luxury 2 bedroom 2 bath condo. 10 minute walk to JSQ Path Station. $1000 + utilities.

This lovely smarthome internest is filled with cool custom colored lights, fluffy pillows, classic books, vinyl records, and the latest playstation games. The pet-friendly building is a modern luxury loft space converted from a high ceiling warehouse. The massive windows and exposed piping make you feel like an artist just by living here.

The space
If you love art and/or dogs, you will love living here. Only a ten minute walk to the Path train station and a 20 minute trip to Manhattan, this area is in the Mana Arts district of Jersey City. There is a friendly local market nearby, a museum and artist loft space across the street, a dog park, and handful of local food trucks serving up amazing street grub throughout the week.

name: Tranquil escape, backyard, private, peaceful house
description:
A fully renovated 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house built in 1890 on a quiet, well kept street, in an up and coming neighborhood. 25 minutes drive to downtown NYC, public transport to NYC nearby, and close to Newark airport. Please ask about a ride from me. For an additional fee I can pick you up at Newark airport. Also offering a ride to PATH station to NYC. Babysitting is also a possibility for an additional fee. You will have 2 rooms and a private bathroom upstairs on the 2nd floor. Sleeps 6.

The space
Covid protocol: The entire house will be cleaned and disinfected in preparation for your arrival. Your rooms will be supplied with sanitizers, extra cleaning supplies and disinfectant. You will have 1 private bathroom, but will share the kitchen when I'm there. You will be expected to follow all social distancing protocols and take precautions in the shared spaces. Cleaning down counter tops, dishes, light switches and other commonly touched areas are required. During
neighborhood_overview:
Diverse would be a key descriptive word for JC. Liberty State Par, an expansive, gorgeous park on the Hudson River with breathtaking views of NYC, there's also McGovern and Columbia Park closer by the house. There's a brand new Tony Hawke founded skate park at Berry Lane Park. Public transport nearby into NYC. There are old and classic restaurants with a very loyal fanbase such as Lou's, Shaun's Table, and Laico's. Please double check for hours and how they operate during these crazy times we're living in.
Downtown JC has a wonderful vibe and easy to get to.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I was born in NYC, but raised in Greece, Maine, New Jersey, and went to college in Greensboro, NC, where I received my BFA in acting. I moved to NYC in 1991 and pursued a career in acting. I have three beautiful children and am getting back into acting and pursuing other creative endeavors. I grew up traveling as a child, had my first skiing experience in the Swiss and Austrian Alps, visited Venice, Italy where a pigeon pooped on my shoulder as I was feeding it, took my first swimming lesson in the Aegean Sea, backpacked from Paris, France to Athens, Greece when I was 16 with my older sister and 2 friends. Clearly I love traveling and now have grown to love hosting. I hope you enjoy your stay at our charming farmhouse in the Catskills.

name: Luxury Oasis on Marina in Paulus Hook
description:
Considering a move to Jersey City & want to test drive living here? Need a bridge gap between home sale & move?

I have a comfy space in a doorman building with elevator and a balcony overlooking the water with views of Manhattan & the Statue of Liberty. Internet & cable including Netflix & Amazon Prime, DVD player. Fully stocked kitchen, super spacious bedroom & bath, separate office area. Queen sized pillow top bed. All linens. Washer/ dryer in unit. Steps from the Liberty Landing ferry.

The space
Beautifully appointed space ideal for a couple with separate office and dining spaces, internet, cable TV including Netflix and Amazon prime. Washer/ dryer. Fully stocked kitchen with every desirable appliance and cookware. Full bath & shower. Balcony with sliding doors off deck. Water views. At end of dead end street for safety and privacy

Other things to note
This is a quiet building - mainly couples and families.
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful enclave along the waterfront in Jersey City with views of Manhattan & the Statue of Liberty directly across from Liberty State Park
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Who am I? A bit of a renaissance woman whose broad interests defy categorization. With university degrees in philosophy and mathematics, she has held executive positions at major corporations, ad agencies and media associations before launching her own communications consultancy in 2002.  She loves to capture life on film or paper and is a certified yoga instructor, teaching a weekly class to cancer survivors.

Beyond that, I'm down to earth, love jazz, my city & exploring the world and figured it would be a win/ win to share my lovely apartment with like minded people looking for an affordable home away from home while they are traveling.

name: Cute Studio Apartment in the Heights
description:
Charming studio apartment, steps away from public transit to NYC. Full kitchen and bath, private entrance on quiet street in Jersey City Heights. Walk to bars, coffee shops, restaurants, and two public parks with gorgeous city views. Five minute walk to 9th Street Light Rail - 30 minute train to NYC or express bus to Port Authority.

Guest access
Enjoy complete privacy with your own secure entrance, and access to front patio.
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City Heights offers easy access to Manhattan, and also lots of fun and quirky neighborhood bars and restaurants. Washington park (just a block away) has tennis, basketball, playgrounds and beautiful gardens. You'll find everything you need on Central Avenue (just a 5 minute walk) including groceries, drugstores, and eclectic shops. Jersey City is known for its chill and diverse urban landscape, with beautiful street art and amazing ethnic cuisine. We're only a five minute drive from downtown galleries and boutiques. Or take the 9th Street Elevator to explore Hoboken's unique restaurants and shops.

name: Amazing Private ROOM
description:
The Heights House is located in The Heights neighborhood in Jersey City, New Jersey. The house has two floors of living space, with a spacious kitchen in each unit, beautiful common areas and plenty of room to work or relax. The two apartments at The Heights House each have five bedrooms and two full bathrooms. This newly remodeled location is a short commute from New York City and conveniently located near dining and entertainment options in both Jersey City and Hoboken.

The space
This recently renovated space features central air conditioning, hardwood floors and updated appliances, with large and welcoming common areas, and comes furnished with everything you’ll need to feel right at home. The two apartments at The Heights House each have five bedrooms and two full bathrooms. This space is move-in ready; all you have to do is show up with your suitcase.

Guest access
The entire apartment (besides other bedrooms) is yours to call home! Y
neighborhood_overview: The Heights House is located near our Washington Park House, a short walk from Washington Park and just blocks from Hoboken. This up-and-coming area is home to a growing restaurant scene, along with a large variety of ethnic cuisines, thanks to the diversity that Jersey City is known for.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
At Outpost Club, we believe that finding a place to live should be as easy as buying a cup of coffee. 
Founded in 2016 by a team who knows what it’s like to move we spent our careers traveling around the world, working remotely and building start-ups.
Outpost Club was launched by three entrepreneurs who understands the challenges of moving to new places, working remotely and building a start-up from scratch in a new place. Our mission is to build a tight-knit community with shared passions and visions, thereby making the world we live in a better place. Apply today, move in tomorrow. Our spaces are cleaned regularly and restocked with all the essentials. Flexibility and convenience matched with beautiful spaces and new friends, that’s what we’re all about for the thousands of guests we’ve served.

This comfortable bedroom has an abundance of natural light. In addition to the attractive full bed, the room furnishings include a side table, lamp. A bureau and closet provide space for storage. A round mirror on the wall completes the package.

A free cleaning of all common areas will be conducted twice per month by our cleaning crew!

Apartment Managed by Outpost Club

The space
"This recently renovated space features hardwood floors and updated appliances, with large and welcoming common areas, and comes furnished with everything you’ll need to feel right at home. There's also a spacious backyard with a custom, lively mural, perfect for hanging out during the warmer months.

This space is move-in ready; all you have to do is show up with your suitcase."

Guest access
The entire apartment (besides other bedrooms) is yours to call home! You'll have open access to the living room, kitchen and all other common a
neighborhood_overview:
"The Washington Park House is located a short walk from Washington Park, on the Jersey City side of the park but mere blocks from Hoboken. This up-and-coming area is home to a growing restaurant scene, along with a large variety of ethnic cuisines, thanks to the diversity that Jersey City is known for.

The house is a short commute into New York City, especially Lower and Midtown Manhattan, and is centrally located near the best of what both Jersey City and Hoboken offer, including dining, entertainment and access to nature."
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
At Outpost Club, we believe that finding a place to live should be as easy as buying a cup of coffee. 
Founded in 2016 by a team who knows what it’s like to move we spent our careers traveling around the world, working remotely and building start-ups.
Outpost Club was launched by three entrepreneurs who understands the challenges of moving to new places, working remotely and building a start-up from scratch in a new place. Our mission is to build a tight-knit community with shared passions and visions, thereby making the world we live in a better place. Apply today, move in tomorrow. Our spaces are cleaned regularly and restocked with all the essentials. Flexibility and convenience matched with beautiful spaces and new friends, that’s what we’re all about for the thousands of guests we’ve served.

name: TWO Cozy 4BR Apartment  Close to NYC
description:
NOTE: This is a spacious listing for TWO units. The first unit has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The second unit has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms!

This is a listing for TWO cozy 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartments minutes to the JSQ PATH train (sleeps up to 20). 15-20 minutes by car and train to NYC, the house is well located in a beautiful, and quiet residential neighborhood so that you can relax after a long day exploring Manhattan or Jersey City. The house is fully stocked with complimentary shower liquids, high speed internet, fresh linens, and towels every single stay. Additionally, there is complimentary Netflix/Hulu :)

To abide by all legal requirements and HOA rules, you WILL be asked to provide a copy of your official government-issued photo ID, confirm your contact information, pass through our verification portal and, in some instances, complete a criminal background check. Failure to provide these documents will result in a cancellation and denied entry.
neighborhood_overview: Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple, but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.
host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about: Hello! I am a customer experience specialist at CozySuites and JC is the founder and head of guest experience at CozySuites. CozySuites was founded to provide travelers authentic and stylish homes at magical prices. Whether for work, family, or leisure travel, CozySuites provides authentically stylish homes that allow our guests to live like locals, but with all the amenities and services of a boutique hotel.

description:
Streaks of luxury alongside comfort and location.

Rainfall shower, heated floors, washer/dryer, Central heat/AC, home automation, brick, designer tiling, French doors. High end 75" TV (Living room) and 5.1 surround sound + and 65" TV (Bedroom).

The space
Modern tech with a salute to contemporary style. Find the design of the apartment carefully planned out including an extendable sofa converted into additional seating, a fold down dining table and fold up counterspace in the kitchen.

For those interested, various smart home devices can be controlled by phone (front door lock, thermostat, heated floors, ceiling fan). Ample closet space with LED strip lighting. Modern washer dryer (in unit).

Don't forget to experience the 5.1 surround sound system with top tier speakers coupled with a high-end 75" Sony HDR 4K TV which has made movie theatres obsolete to many.

Kitchen:
- N
neighborhood_overview:
Hamilton Park is a lovely community with great restaurants, bars, cafes, and other local businesses all within walking distance. Further south towards Grove St area (6-8 minute walk) you will find more bars and restaurants and a livelier nightlife.

Just outside to the east is Newport Mall as well as the Jersey City offices of many major companies such as Citi JPMorgan, UBS, Societe Generale, HSBC, Bank of America, Cigna, RBS, BNP Paribas, AXA among others. All walking distance from the apartment

name: Modern 1BR1BA-Minutes to NYC & DOWNTOWN JC:Parking
description:
Welcome to The #HilltopHideawayJC steps from PATH subway station for quick transit into downtown/midtown NYC. Also a quick walk to all that Downtown Jersey City has to offer (Restaurants, bars, parks, shops, etc.) PRIVATE PARKING SPOT AVAILABLE

COVID-19 Cleaning Compliant Comfortable & Spacious private 1 bed 1 bath apartment on the ground floor (on grade ) in a Victorian building features new kitchen & bathroom & outside porch.

Ideal for couples, business travelers, families with kids.

The space
Modern, spacious apartment featuring cozy & thoughtful touches throughout.

Living room features large Smart TV, comfy couches, Klipsch Bluetooth Speaker & vintage bar cart.

Next to living room is a cozy reading nook with comfy chair, as well as games & books.

New bathroom features herringbone marble tile & large bathtub.

Renovated kitchen features brand new appliances (Dishwasher, microwave, fridge)
neighborhood_overview:
The Hilltop is a quiet and secluded neighborhood in booming Jersey City. A short walk to the PATH Subway that gets to downtown or midtown Manhattan in less than 20 minutes makes this the perfect spot for business trips, visiting family or taking in all that the NYC Metro has to offer the modern traveler.

The #HilltopHideawayJC is also steps away from Downtown Jersey City, which has blossomed into a destination in and of itself. Nightlife, events, restaurants, museums & parks are at your fingertips and even in a "covid world" there are opportunities to explore and experience.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, My name is Derrek!  I live in Jersey City with my family and  work in commercial finance.

I currently operate 2 Short Term Rentals :

1)The Mountain House, @mountainhouse668 , a luxury mountain retreat in the heart of the Historic Catskills Mountains.  Located the ideal getaway distance, 2.5hrs from NYC, 3hrs from Boston.  Perfect for large groups like  family reunions, corporate retreats, yoga retreats or microweddings!

2)The #HilltopHideawayJC,  this is a spacious and modern 1 Bed 1 Bath apartment in the building I live in with my family.  It is located in the exclusive Hilltop section of Jersey City which has the best of both worlds: a quiet neighborhood feel steps away from transit directly to midtown or downtown NYC  via PATH subway and a quick walk to booming Downtown Jersey City and al it has to offer.  Ideal for business trips, visiting family in the area or experiencing all that JC & the NYC Metro has to offer

name: Comfy, Cozy room close to NYC and Newark Airport
description: COVID CLEAN!! Budget friendly room on the 2nd floor in a gorgeous renovated 1890 house in Jersey City. 25 minutes drive to downtown NYC. There's also an NJ Transit bus half a block from the house to Port Authority, NYC, the PATH train easily accessed by the Light Rail or a quick Lyft ride away. A wonderful block with wonderful neighbors who are helpful & friendly. If you want to relax at the house, there's a great patio in the back w/ a bbq grill. laundry in the basement for a small fee.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I was born in NYC, but raised in Greece, Maine, New Jersey, and went to college in Greensboro, NC, where I received my BFA in acting. I moved to NYC in 1991 and pursued a career in acting. I have three beautiful children and am getting back into acting and pursuing other creative endeavors. I grew up traveling as a child, had my first skiing experience in the Swiss and Austrian Alps, visited Venice, Italy where a pigeon pooped on my shoulder as I was feeding it, took my first swimming lesson in the Aegean Sea, backpacked from Paris, France to Athens, Greece when I was 16 with my older sister and 2 friends. Clearly I love traveling and now have grown to love hosting. I hope you enjoy your stay at our charming farmhouse in the Catskills.

Amazing energy to this house. Wonderful neighbors, all very helpful and want to keep it that way with them. Each bedroom is super comfy, low key, and has a wonderful vibe. Spacious kitchen to whip ups a fab meal, or zip off to NYC to see the sights in 30 minutes.

name: Perfect Room with A/C, Intercom System, & Laundry
description:
Our Journal Square House is located in the historic Journal Square area of Jersey City, New Jersey. The Journal Square House is made up of two brick row houses, all which share a common backyard, and is a short walk from public transportation and multiple historic sites of interest.

The space
This newly renovated space features hardwood floors, updated appliances and exposed brick. The kitchen and common areas are spacious and welcoming, with skylights in some apartments and entertainment like air hockey and ping pong on the lower levels, as well as a backyard. The best part? It’s all furnished with everything you’ll need for work and play, whether you’re meal prepping or hosting a movie night.

This space is move-in ready; all you have to do is show up with your suitcase.

Guest access
The entire apartment (besides other bedrooms) is yours to call home! You'll have open access to the living room, kitchen and all other common areas
neighborhood_overview: This house is located in the revitalized Journal Square neighborhood, filled with historic buildings, newer high rises and plenty of dining options. It’s only a short commute into New York City on public transportation and is an easy commute to downtown Jersey City, Hoboken and the Hudson River waterfront.

host_about:
At Outpost Club, we believe that finding a place to live should be as easy as buying a cup of coffee. 
Founded in 2016 by a team who knows what it’s like to move we spent our careers traveling around the world, working remotely and building start-ups.
Outpost Club was launched by three entrepreneurs who understands the challenges of moving to new places, working remotely and building a start-up from scratch in a new place. Our mission is to build a tight-knit community with shared passions and visions, thereby making the world we live in a better place. Apply today, move in tomorrow. Our spaces are cleaned regularly and restocked with all the essentials. Flexibility and convenience matched with beautiful spaces and new friends, that’s what we’re all about for the thousands of guests we’ve served.

neighborhood_overview: This house is located in the revitalized Journal Square neighborhood, filled with historic buildings, newer high rises and plenty of dining options. It’s only a short commute into New York City on public transportation and is an easy commute to downtown Jersey City, Hoboken and the Hudson River waterfront.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
At Outpost Club, we believe that finding a place to live should be as easy as buying a cup of coffee. 
Founded in 2016 by a team who knows what it’s like to move we spent our careers traveling around the world, working remotely and building start-ups.
Outpost Club was launched by three entrepreneurs who understands the challenges of moving to new places, working remotely and building a start-up from scratch in a new place. Our mission is to build a tight-knit community with shared passions and visions, thereby making the world we live in a better place. Apply today, move in tomorrow. Our spaces are cleaned regularly and restocked with all the essentials. Flexibility and convenience matched with beautiful spaces and new friends, that’s what we’re all about for the thousands of guests we’ve served.

name: Great Room with A/C, Intercom System, & Laundry
description:
Our Journal Square House is located in the historic Journal Square area of Jersey City, New Jersey. The Journal Square House is made up of two brick row houses, all which share a common backyard, and is a short walk from public transportation and multiple historic sites of interest.

The space
This newly renovated space features hardwood floors, updated appliances and exposed brick. The kitchen and common areas are spacious and welcoming, with skylights in some apartments and entertainment like air hockey and ping pong on the lower levels, as well as a backyard. The best part? It’s all furnished with everything you’ll need for work and play, whether you’re meal prepping or hosting a movie night. This space is move-in ready; all you have to do is show up with your suitcase.

Guest access
The entire apartment (besides other bedrooms) is yours to call home! You'll have open access to the living room, kitchen and all other common areas.
